name: UIKeyModifierFlags
desc: Constants that indicate which modifier keys are pressed.

items.name: static var alphaShift: UIKeyModifierFlags
items.desc: A modifier flag that indicates the user pressed the Caps Lock key.

items.name: static var shift: UIKeyModifierFlags
items.desc: A modifier flag that indicates the user pressed the Shift key.

items.name: static var control: UIKeyModifierFlags
items.desc: A modifier flag that indicates the user pressed the Control key.

items.name: static var alternate: UIKeyModifierFlags
items.desc: A modifier flag that indicates the user pressed the Option key.

items.name: static var command: UIKeyModifierFlags
items.desc: A modifier flag that indicates the user pressed the Command key.

items.name: static var numericPad: UIKeyModifierFlags
items.desc: A modifier flag that indicates the user pressed a key located on the numeric keypad.
